break_mode_text: Let's take a break and look up at the sky.
no_photos_message: Record photos of the scenery from afar.
before_start_text: Soon, rest your eyes by gazing into the distance.

notification_template_without_seconds: {minutes} minutes later, we will remind you to relax your eyes.
